To add a bank account, make a small deposit to Coinbase from your bank account. You will be able to use the deposited amount to buy bitcoin.
You\'re now all set to buy / sell with your %1$s card.
You\'re now all set to buy / sell with your %1$s bank account.
Get $10 of bitcoin for free when you buy $100 or more of bitcoin. Download the app now!

Deposits are placed on a temporary hold while we wait for the transfer to clear. You can instantly buy with all your funds, but you can only send digital currencies, or withdraw to your bank account up to your available balance.
*Our standard buy/sell fee is %s%%. Learn more about our fee structure here

Buying digital currencies like bitcoin and ethereum is not enabled in %1$s yet. We\'re working hard to bring this feature to as many countries as possible.

NOTICE By the Florida Office of Financial Regulation:

BY GRANTING COINBASE A LICENSE, THE FLORIDA OFFICE OF FINANCIAL REGULATION IS NOT ENDORSING THE USE OF DIGITAL OR VIRTUAL CURRENCIES.

· U.S. currency is legal tender backed by the U.S. government.
· Digital and virtual currencies are not issued or backed by the U.S. government, or related in any way to U.S. currency, and have fewer regulatory protections.
· The value of digital and virtual currencies is derived from supply and demand in the global marketplace which can rise or fall independently of any fiat (government) currency.
· Holding digital and virtual currencies carries exchange rate and other types of risk.

POTENTIAL USERS OF DIGITAL OR VIRTUAL CURRENCIES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO BITCOIN, SHOULD BE FOREWARNED OF A POSSIBLE FINANCIAL LOSS AT THE TIME THAT SUCH CURRENCIES ARE EXCHANGED FOR FIAT CURRENCY DUE TO AN UNFAVORABLE EXCHANGE RATE. A FAVORABLE EXCHANGE RATE AT THE TIME OF EXCHANGE CAN RESULT IN A TAX LIABILITY. PLEASE CONSULT YOUR TAX ADVISOR REGARDING ANY TAX CONSEQUENCES ASSOCIATED WITH YOUR HOLDING OR USE OF DIGITAL OR VIRTUAL CURRENCIES.
To be the most trusted place to buy and sell digital currency, we protect your personal data and comply with the EUs General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
Below is a brief summary of how we process your personal data. For more detailed information, please read our full Privacy Policy.
Coinbase UK Ltd. and CB Payments Ltd. are the “controllers” of the personal data you provide to Coinbase. We collect identity, job-related, and financial information about you.

We will use your personal data to, among other things, process your transactions, manage and administer your customer account, personalize content, analyze how to improve our services, protect you from fraud, and comply with legal and regulatory obligations. With your consent, we’d like to keep in touch with you about the work we’re doing, including feature changes and product updates.
We will share your data within the Coinbase group, with vendors and service providers, and with other organizations as required by law.

You can exercise your privacy rights at any time by visiting your Privacy Rights dashboard in Settings. Your privacy rights include access, correction, erasure, restriction, objection, and data portability.
For security purposes, we ask that you submit your request to access or export your data through our web application at www.coinbase.com.

Request to correct or complete my personal data held by Coinbase. Note that depending on the type of data you choose to correct, it may impact our ability to process your transactions or manage your account. Use the form below to send your request to Coinbase.
Request a copy of my personal data held by Coinbase. Use the form below to send your request to Coinbase.

Request deletion of my personal data held by Coinbase. Note that if you select the option to delete all of the data we hold on you, we will also prompt you to withdraw your funds and close your account. Once you do this, it cannot be undone. Note that due to some of our regulatory requirements we may be unable to delete some or all of your data at this time. Use the form below to send your request to Coinbase.
Request export of my personal data held by Coinbase. Use the form below to send your request to Coinbase.

Request that Coinbase stops processing some or all of my data. Note that if you request that we stop processing of data we collect for legal or ID verification purposes, you may be required to close your account. Use the form below to send your request to Coinbase.
Thank you for submitting your request! You should receive an email confirmation shortly. Our Support team will follow up with you as necessary to complete your request.

Only SEPA transfers are supported at this time. Wire transfers are not supported.

Note that your total combined fiat balance must be less than €225,000.00.
Transfers exceeding this amount will be reversed.

Funds will typically arrive within 1–2 business days.

You can find a further explanation within our account suspension policy. We hope to restore service soon, so please check back again.
